briefTitle: Satisfaction and QUality of Life After Breast REconstruction
officialTitle: Evaluation of the Satisfaction and the Quality of Life of Patients After Breast Reconstruction as Part of Breast Cancer. Comparison of Several Technics.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Evaluate the quality of life and the satisfaction of patients who had a breast reconstruction immediate or differed according to the technics used
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients 18 years old or more
* History of mastectomy for breast cancer all types and TNM status
* Patients who beneficiated a breast reconstruction immediate or secondary finished between 01/01/2015 and 31/12/16 (not included nipples)
* Accept to answer to the questionnaire

Exclusion Criteria:

* Deceased patient
* Opposition of the patient to the data collection
* History of preventive mastectomy
* Patient who has local recurrence or metastatic cancer
* Patient under guardianship or protection of vulnerable adults
